name: Sticky Rush
description:
Ready for the adrenaline rush of a lifetime? Lot’s of levels and tons of fun are waiting for you! This is Sticky Rush, and it is sticky, climby fun!

Playing is simple, but winning isn't. To play, you need to сlimb up buildings; however, you've got to keep an eye on the course because there are obstacles!

Different levels offer different challenges, and as you progress, you'll see just how deep this game goes! Try it now!
